MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This loads data from customer_group in sql server to edm_customer_group in oracle.
MAPPING.NAME: m_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation reads data from the source table:CUSTOMER_GROUP
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_customer_group

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This trasformation is used to count the number of source rows
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: AGG_SOURCE_COUNT

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the sessstarttime and update userid.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression to set the default values for some columns in the info_etl_cntl_tbl. As the mapping is common for all LOBs some of the columns are parameterised.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_CNTL_FILE

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: 'This loads data from customer_group in sql server to edm_customer_group in oracle.'
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: O_MAP_DESC

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation reads data from the source table:CUSTOMER_GROUP
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_customer_group

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This trasformation is used to count the number of source rows
INSTANCE.NAME: AGG_SOURCE_COUNT

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This transformation passes the sessstarttime and update userid.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Expression to set the default values for some columns in the info_etl_cntl_tbl. As the mapping is common for all LOBs some of the columns are parameterised.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_CNTL_FILE

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This loads data from customer_group in sql server to edm_customer_group in oracle.
SESSION.NAME: s_m_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Post SQL
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
UPDATE INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL SET TGT_VAL=( SELECT count(*) FROM EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP WHERE UPDATE_TIMESTAMP= (SELECT MAX(MAP_RUN_DT) FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP' AND MAP_RUN_DT <=SYSDATE)) WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP' AND MAP_RUN_DT=(SELECT MAX(MAP_RUN_DT) FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP' AND MAP_RUN_DT <=SYSDATE ) ;
UPDATE INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL SET STATUS_YN = (CASE WHEN SRC_VAL = TGT_VAL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP' AND MAP_RUN_DT=(SELECT MAX(MAP_RUN_DT) FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP' AND MAP_RUN_DT <=SYSDATE );

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Save session log for these runs
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This is a Dummy mapping and its session is reused in different workflows to send Emails , If the Source and Target Quantities are different OR The source and Target counts are not matching in Parent Mapping
MAPPING.NAME: m_EMAIL

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Dummy record 'X' is selected from dual
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_DUAL

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Dummy record 'X' is selected from dual
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_DUAL

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This session will be triggered to send an Email if the source and target counts are not matching in the Parent Mapping
SESSION.NAME: s_m_CNT_EMAIL

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL.SRC_VAL, INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL.TGT_VAL FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL.STATUS_YN='N' AND INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP' AND MAP_RUN_DT=(SELECT MAX(MAP_RUN_DT) FROM INFO_ETL_CNTL_TBL WHERE INFO_MAP_NAME = 'm_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP' AND MAP_RUN_DT <=SYSDATE )

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Save session log for these runs
Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: Extension
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: This is a Reusable Session. This session will be triggered to send an Email if the source and target counts are not matching in the Parent Mapping

WORKFLOW.DESCRIPTION: This loads data from customer_group in sql server to edm_customer_group in oracle.
WORKFLOW.NAME: wf_s_m_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Email Text
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
Dear Reader,
The target and source count for the mapping :m_EDM_CUSTOMER_GROUP, i.e , the load from customer_group(SQL SERVER) to edm_customer_group(ORACLE) do not match.
The source and target count is attached %a<$PMTargetFileDir\HIGHLEVEL_SALES_FORECAST\TGT\TARGET_FILE.CSV>
Warm Regards BI-ETL email service
